Text: MEMBERSHIP REWARDSR bonus pointsIMAGE Every day its more bills Sometimes life gets too busy to really stay on top of them American ExpressR Bill Center can help Try it and get MEMBERSHIP REWARDSR bonus points Click herebillcenteraexpemBILLC Dear Cardmember Lets face it No one likes bills But heres a way to manage them more easily Even when life gets hectic Its called American Express Bill Center You can let American Express receive pay and organize all your bills It can really simplify things Well keep your bills organized by posting them on a secure passwordprotected Web page We can notify you by email when bills come in And remind you when theyre due You can set up recurring billing so certain bills are paid automatically every month Youll even get MEMBERSHIP REWARDS bonus points when you receive and pay two bills by December Just enter code when you enroll Of course many services offer bill payment online But you still have to worry about when the bills are due And you have to worry about lost or forgotten bills For a low monthly fee Bill Center helps manage all that Cardmembers feel more in control because all their bills are posted all in one place And you can access your bills anywhere Lets say youre on a trip and havent kept on top of things Bill Center gives you total access to view and pay your bills no matter where no matter when It eliminates the stress of putting it off and having to worry about overdue bills Managing bills can be as easy as a few clicks Bill Center helps keep you in control Try it and see for yourself Sincerely Pierric Beckert Senior Vice President Interactive Services New Business CLICK HERE to visitbillcenteraexpemBILLC now And enter code to qualify for MEMBERSHIP REWARDS points This email was sent to NRONCOM If you received this email at a different address this email message was forwarded If you do not wish to receive future email offers from American Express please hit the reply button and let us know by typing the word REMOVE and indicate this email address in the subject line Please visit the American Express Privacy Statement atprivacyaexpemBILLC to set review or change preferences regarding the type of emails you want to receive To be eligible to earn bonus points you must be enrolled in the MEMBERSHIP REWARDS program prior to enrolling in the Bill Center In order to qualify for the points at the time of enrollment you will need to enter as the offer code and receive and pay two bills by December Bonus points will be credited to your account within weeks after you receive and pay your second bill This offer is only good for new enrollees and is limited to one bonus per Cardmember Copyright American Express Company All Rights Reserved
